appetizers.name: Roll-Ups
appetizers.description: Thinly sliced turkey wrapped around a piece of swiss cheese and pickle spear.

appetizers.name: J-Pops
appetizers.description: Jalapeno stuffed with cream cheese that has been wrapped in bacon.

cold sandwiches.name: Classic Turkey
cold sandwiches.description: Deli sliced turkey on thick slices of wheat bread with swiss cheese and mustard.

cold sandwiches.name: Classic Ham
cold sandwiches.description: Deli sliced ham on thick slices of wheat bread with cheddar cheese and mustard.

hot sandwiches.name: Hot Ham & Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: A grilled sandwich with deli sliced ham on thick slices of wheat bread with cheddar cheese

hot sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: A grilled sandwich made from wheat bread and both cheddar and mozzarella cheese.

desserts.name: Cherry Cheese Cake
desserts.description: Small slice of cheese cake topped with cherries and chocolate syrup.

desserts.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
desserts.description: A large cookie made from oatmeal with raisins.

drinks.name: Soda
drinks.description: Your choice of either a can of Coke, Dr. Pepper, or Sprite.

drinks.name: Juice
drinks.description: Your choice of either a glass of Grape juice, Orange Juice, or Apple juice.
